front.title: Use cases for policy-based resource management in VNF-FG

abstract.t: This document describes two use cases for policy-based resource management in VNF-FG. These two use cases are not covered by two documents [irtf-nfvrg-resource-management] and [irtf-nfvrg-policy-based-resource-management]. These two use cases considers service plan policies in VNF-FG placement and affinity policies in Network forwarding path update.
